project_abstract.cdata: The School Rehabilitation and Capacity Building Project will sustain the delivery of basic education services project during Albania's difficult economic transition and to build institutional capacity for planning, management and quality assurance of education in an increasingly decentralized system. The project will: (a) accelerate rehabilitation of damaged and dilapidated school facilities in Albania's 37 districts; and (b) build capacity of key sector institutions on stimulate efficient use of fiscal resources and assure quality of learning outcomes.
